title: Best way to travel
content:
I live in malleswaram, which will be the best way to travel to pes rr. Should I take metro from mantri till mysore road or should I take college bus
bus.

comments.body:
Dont take college bus as it would probably waste your time more   
get the metro at mantri / srirampura   
if college starts at 8 , you can board 7.10/7.15 metro and you will reach mysore road by 7.45  
You can then take the college shuttle bus / bmtc bus from there  
Metro card + Bus pass would be a good combo i guess
